itunes:title: Winning $800,000 On Snapchat (Dominic Andre)
title: Winning $800,000 On Snapchat (Dominic Andre)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
We have our friend Dominic Andre with us today. We chat about how he grew a million followers in 20 days, winning a fortune on snapchat, are aliens real, odds at casinos, aligning the pyramids with the stars, and doing some fun science experiments!


Check him out on instagram https://www.instagram.com/dominicandre_


Watch our CLIPS Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCChM6tHqj-4FwbG_KdIjKUw

Watch our FULL Video Podcast on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjmqbxZsoH1YwihrGgU1vPA

Follow our Podcast on Instagram: @lightweightspod https://www.instagram.com/lightweightspod/

Follow Joe on Instagram: @ughitsjoe https://www.instagram.com/ughitsjoe/

Follow Ilya on Instagram: @ilyafeddy https://www.instagram.com/ilyafeddy/

Follow us on Tik Tok @lightweightspod
